page.title: 09THE FREEMAN HOSPITAL
page.content:
Surveying the hospital we talked to many of the people who work there.
The student nurse finds the staff and patients friendly and that the hospital is a good place to work.
The staff nurse finds the hospital very good in general and everything that is needed always there.
The sister finds the hospital good and likes the hours which are approximately 38 hours a week.
the chaplain finds the hospital good but that there are always ways of improving. The patients always come to him for help and reassurance and he always tries his best to help. He is on call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
